title: A Te De Qihuan Zhi Lu
synopsis: In the fantasy world of Utopus, a beast born from an eggshell, Duo Le, accidentally traversed the earth, and accidentally brought the pointed-eared orphan Art and the overbearing child Wang Leihu back to Wu To the mainland. The genius magical girl Xini who met by chance led them to find the way back, but found that this accident had been predicted thousands of years ago. The weak and autistic Arter was born with the great mission of saving the Uto Continent. Under the rule of the You Clan Moza, this beautiful and magical continent has become misty and plundered. Art’s biological mother has also been Moza was imprisoned in the Sky City. With family and friendship... (translated form iqiyi)
